level.heading: Application of chapter.
level.text: The requirements of this chapter shall apply to the practices and procedures employed by insurers and their agents and employees in making determinations about any individual or group policy or contract of health, disability, or life insurance.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 6-132
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-132, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 31-1601.
